resp: Not as of yet. I plan on watching it once it is available on dvd

context: Recommender: Hi, I am here to help you find a movie trailer you would enjoy. Seeker: Awesome, sounds great. I'm looking for some great movie recommendations. I'm a huge fan of horror movies. Recommender: I will be glad to help. Horror movies are my favorite too. Is there a specific type of horror movies you enjoy? Seeker: So glad you asked. Yes there is. I like monster movies, like The Thing, and sci-fi horror movies like Underworld, and Dracula 2000. I grew up watching those types of movies. Not into movies like Saw and The Purge. Horror movies with good plots, lots of action and suspense, and eventually at the end of the movie, how the animal or monster is caught and obliterated.
resp: I love sci-fi horror too! All of those are great movies. I particularly like the Alien movies. Sygourney Weaver is a fantastic actress.

If you love movies like that I would suggest Pumpkinhead. It's an excellent cult classic!
